snippet.title: Debris Trailer
snippet.description:
Debris is an atmospheric single-player/co-op adventure game set in beautifully dangerous underwater ice caves. You must find a way back to the surface, but power is scarce, your team is lost and unusual creatures lurk in the darkness. 

Debris is coming to Steam October, 2017 for PC and Mac.

Escape together or die alone!

Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/669660/Debris/
